description: A utility method to retrieve all exposed variable and accessor members It will return variables, and readwrite-only accessors that are public by default, but you can specific different options to retrieve other combinations.

values: fromDefinition the definition to retrieve the member definitions from
accessorFilter bitflag combination of MemberTypes.ACCESS_READ_WRITE (the default) or MemberTypes.READ_ONLY or MemberTypes.WRITE_ONLY. Set this to 0 (zero) to exclude all accessors.
publicOnly true if only public namespaced members should be returned (the default)
